data.name: Journey to Kalamsat
data.description: An inspirational talk by the creators of World's smallest satellite 'Kalamsat' to the student fraternity of Anna University.

data.name: The Beautiful Mind
data.description:
It's the beautiful minds of this world that win over the beautiful faces. They win hearts by winning minds!
This event consists of tricky questions and you have to answer them, as simple as that. But here comes the crux:You'll need to code to find the answer.
Come impress us with the beauty of your brain!!
Event Starts at March 19, 9 PM.
Event Link - http://beautifulmind.abacus.org.in/
#beautifulMind
#Puzzle #coding #online
#Abacus2017

data.name: Davinci Code - Online Event
data.description: Fan of clues,puzzles and all things mazey? This is THE event for you. Join aBaCUS' online puzzle event DaVinci Code and prove your quick-wittedness and deciphering skills. What more,you have chances of winning exciting prizes too!

data.name: Wall Street Hacks - Management Workshop
data.description: Do you fancy yourself in the stock market? Want to learn the ins and outs of one of the most lucrative and risky ventures in the world? Then look no further! Our Wall Street Hacks Workshop is your next destination!

data.name: Water Rocketry
data.description: You want to actually do some actual engineering. And you want to have fun doing it. Then put your brains together and try to launch a water rocket!

data.name: God Speed - RC Nitro Car Racing
data.description:
Speed has never killed anyone, suddenly becoming stationary... that's what gets you.
Fasten your seatbelts for Godspeed - Kurukshetra 17's ultimate RC car racing event. Because with us, there is no such thing as a speed limit.

data.name: IBM Machine Learning - Workshop
data.description: From Apple's Siri to Google's Self Driving Car, machine learning is everywhere and is pretty much inevitable in modern computing. Learn more about this pillar of computer science from IBM at our IBM Machine Learning Workshop !

data.name: Gesture Controlled Robotics - Workshop
data.description: Get a glimpse of the cutting edge of human machine interaction with the Gesture Controlled Robots workshop! Gain insight about gesture recognition technology and build a robotic companion of your own controlled by hand and head movements!

data.name: Robotic Events
data.description:
Do you control your robots? Or do your robots control you? Find out as you and your bot are tested by fire at Kurukshetra 17's Robotics events line up! 
#Robotics
#Engineering

data.name: IDRL Episode 3 at CEG, Anna University
data.description: IDRL Episode 3 as part of Kurukshetra at College of Engineering (CEG), Chennai. Be there to witness the sport of drone racing at this major college in Chennai!

data.name: Delta Wing Aircraft - Workshop
data.description: The delta wing aircraft - a component used in all modern fighter jets, the foundation of supersonic planes and a pillar of current defence technology. Learn more about this technology and build a model of your own at the AerotriX' Delta Wing Aircraft workshop.

data.name: Riddles Of The Sphinx - Online Event (Main Run)
data.description: Gather your wits about you and go up against the sphinx! Kurukshetra's Riddles of the Sphinx is back again with even more puzzles to solve, riddles to crack and answers to squirrel out in the ultimate online treasure hunt!

data.name: Riddles of the Sphinx - Online Event (Trial Run)
data.description: Gather your wits about you and go up against the sphinx! Kurukshetra's Riddles of the Sphinx is back again with even more puzzles to solve, riddles to crack and answers to squirrel out in the ultimate online treasure hunt!

data.name: Cerebra - Online Math Event
data.description:
Are you a card shark? Someone good at playing with probability? Is your idea of relaxing Sudoku? Then put your skills to the test! 
Visit cerebra.kurukshetra.org.in and try your luck with Cerebra!

data.name: Dalal Bull - Online Event (Trial Run)
data.description: Play around in our virtual stock market and show off your money making skills at Dalal Bull! Match your wits against the canniest players around and prove that you have what it takes to be the Wolf of Dalal Street!

data.name: Club orientation
data.description: In order to create awareness about various clubs in CEG among the freshers and encourage them to join in the clubs in which they are interested.

data.name: Kurukshetra Quizzes
data.description:
"I never wanted to see any other quiz show"-Charles Van Doren 
To all the intellects out there who alwyas keep brainstorming ! Woah ! You are the right arena .Fuel your grey matter and be all set to attend the k! Biz quiz , k! General quiz, k! Open quiz and SciTech quiz .

data.name: Learn Python for Free From MIT via EDX : ISresource Discussion
data.description:
Open for all Python Discussion Forum :

Free 9 week course begining on 10th of June from MIT via the EDX platform.

Register on www.edx.org and enroll for the course below(it is a Massive Open Online Course or MOOC and below is its location):
https://www.edx.org/course/introduction-computer-science-mitx-6-00-1x-0

What you'll learn:
A Notion of computation
The Python programming language
Some simple algorithms
Testing and debugging
An informal introduction to algorithmic complexity
Data structures

Receive a free honor code certificate at the end of the course. 
Disclaimer: ISresource is not in any way affiliated to the content of this course or EDX.org or MIT. ISresource is a  discussion forum. ISresource is promoting this Massive Open Online Course because of its value.

data.name: Debugging @ aBACUS'15
data.description: They say debugging is twice as hard as programming. Bugs can be very irritating as any programmer would know. Even the smallest of bugs can ruin a well thought-out program. In order to spot an error, you should first understand what the programmer’s intended logic is. Programmers spend a lot of time finding errors in their own code. To say de-bugging is a very essential skill in coding would be an understatement. The aim of this event is to get young coders to think out the possibilities and understand the given code before attempting to correct the bugs in it.

data.name: Coding Events at Kurukshetra 2015
data.description:
Coding events are some of the flagship events of Kurukshetra attracting the best coders to a single destination, CEG.

SCHEDULE:

Day 1: Jan 29th

Aricent's Onsite Programming Contest - Prelims at 10 AM and Finals at 3 PM

Microsoft's Tame the Code - Prelims at 12 PM

Day 2: Jan 30th

Onsite Debugging - Prelims at 10:30 AM

Heptathlon - Prelims at 12 PM

Microsoft's Tame the Code - Finals at 2 PM

Day 3: Jan 31st

Onsite Debugging - 2nd Round at 9 AM and Finals at 3  PM

Heptathlon - Finals at 12:30 PM

Team Kurukshetra wishes you best of luck!
